sentences.sContent: We enjoyed the picnic until a thunderstorm intervened.
sentences.sContent_eng: We enjoyed the picnic until a thunderstorm intervened.
sentences.sCn: 一场暴风雨影响了我们野餐时的兴致。

sentences.sContent: It plays an increasingly important part in meteorology for cloud, precipitation, hail and thunderstorm detection as well as the navigation of aircraft and ships.
sentences.sContent_eng: It plays an increasingly important part in meteorology for cloud, precipitation, hail and thunderstorm detection as well as the navigation of aircraft and ships.
sentences.sCn: 它在对云层、降水、冰雹和雷暴的气象探测以及在船舰和飞机的导航中，起着日益重要的作用。

sentences.sContent: The Fermi Space Telescope is so sensitive to these gamma ray bursts that it doesn't even need to be positioned right over a thunderstorm to detect the TGFs.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Fermi Space Telescope is so sensitive to these gamma ray bursts that it doesn't even need to be positioned right over a thunderstorm to detect the TGFs.
sentences.sCn: 费米太空望远镜对这些伽马射线脉冲很灵敏，以至于它甚至不需要调整位置对准雷暴的正上方，就能来探测TGF信号。

trans.tranOther: a storm with thunder and lightning
